content: New to this concept and a little confused… When using an 8pt grid do you throw away a specific column grid system (e.g. 4-col on mobile, 8-col on tablet, 12-col on desktop)? A 12-col grid wouldn’t break into elements divisible by 8… For example how would you create three equally sized vertically centered blocks across a design (since it’s not divisible by 8)? Also, how do your developers deal with no columns?
